text: This song is truly beautiful. Mitsuda is one of my favorite composers of all time. His style really influenced me, I hope to write pieces like he does one day. It's a shame there will never be another Shadow Hearts.

author: Vordox

text: It's thanks to you and your uploading of the series' songs that I got interested in Shadow Hearts. Now its one of my favorite video game series. Not only does it have a real fun gameplay, characters and plot, its got great music like this. So thanks again Supra, here's hoping for a SH4. XD
author: I, Dio!

text: I'm gonna have to play this series now. It's when you upload tracks as great as this that I truely realize just how much I appreciate what you do, uploading these tracks and inspiring so many others to do so as well. Thank you.
author: Arc13

text:
I also must point out, I'll admit until now I didn't listen to the Shadow Hearts tracks you've loaded. After Tsugunai, I gave this a listen.
I'm almost at tears from the beauty of this song. I'm usually a very picky gamer, specially with more recent(PS2 era and beyond)games, but I think with so many tracks up here, Yausnori Mitsuda, and many other reasons...
author: Arc13

text:
Yasunori Mitsuda is probably the best(if not the most underappreciated)composer ever.
Shadow Hearts,Chrono,Mario Party,and many others.
An unheard of(HIGHLY recommend)soundtrack by him, Tsugunai Atonement.Most notably The Devil and one of my favorite songs ever,Battle With The Devil.Really ought to check out his other stuff if you ever get the chance.After I watched Crimson Echoes and learned of that soundtrack,I looked up all his stuff and find Yasunori Mitsuda's work my favorite music ever.
author: Arc13

text:
Arc13 
don't forget his work such as Xenogears
